title-group.article-title: Method of Designing Bolted Joints for Mounting Large-Diameter Bearings

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright Â© Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc. 1980

abstract.p: A method is presented for calculating fastener requirements for use in mounting large diameter anti-friction bearings. Procedures for calculating static and dynamic fastener loading and capacity are presented, taking into account fastener diameter and length, resilience of the fastener and the clamped parts, fastener grade, number of interfaces, preload scatter, tightening method, etc.
